name: Flora Source Multi Probiotic Capsules
short_description: <style type="text/css"><!--.New1211CatTop	{font-family:Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif;	font-size:15px;	color:#333;	padding-top:25px;	padding-right:15px;	padding-bottom:30px;	padding-left:15px;	line-height:17px}.New1211CatTop h1	{	background-color:transparent!
description:
Nutri-Health Flora Source

Reduce Embarrassing Gas, Bloating and Constipation

Flora Source features 16 strains of active, friendly bacteria plus scFOS® prebiotic fiber. Each daily dose (two capsules) of this gut-healthy probiotic formula gives you 32 billion colony forming units of the most powerful strains available.

How will Flora Source benefit your health?

Delivering friendly bacteria to your gut helps restore healthy balance to your digestive system and keep it running smoothly. The broad spectrum of strains of probiotics found in Flora Source work together for advanced performance…

  • Supports regular bowel movements
  • Promotes good digestion and colon health
  • Reduces gas and flatulence
  • Decreases instances of constipation
  • Protects healthy bacteria when taking antibiotics
  • Eases gurgling and regurgitation
  • Improves nausea symptoms

Why choose Flora Source?

Flora Source includes a powerhouse strain of friendly bacteria you won’t find in most commercially-available formulas.

Bif Relief 24-7™ (Bifidobacterium lactis HN019) is the first probiotic strain to be tested in humans shown to be effective in relieving the seven most common digestive problems: constipation, irregular bowel movements, flatulence, regurgitation, abdominal pain, nausea and a gurgling gut.

In Flora Source, you get Bif Relief, plus 15 carefully selected probiotic strains, and scFOS® prebiotic fiber to help nourish and strengthen the probiotics.

The breakthrough ingredients in Flora Source are specially encapsulated with the patented Matrix Encapsulation process, which protects them from stomach acid en route to your intestines, where they’re needed most.

* These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

description:
NEW -  TruBone Complete - a Breakthrough in Bone Health!

Experience the NEW Breakthrough in Bone Health! TruBone Complete™ combines clinically researched ingredients to strengthen your bones from the inside out.

  • Stimulates bone growth and slows down bone loss
  • Maximizes benefits of dietary calcium
  • Is an easy to take, non-calcium, one-a-day capsule

 

Why Try TruBone Complete?

During the aging process, bones naturally become thinner and more brittle. Old bone is broken down faster than your body can make new bone. And now we know why…

Bone health isn’t just about shoring up the outer bone with calcium. It’s about actually creating new bone – from the inside out. But no calcium supplement will do that.


TruBone Complete helps preserve and widen the surface of inner bone to…

  • Boost bone-building Osteoblast cells by up to a whopping 20% 
  • Promote collagen production so calcium sticks to your bones – providing a "whole bone" solution that strengthens and supports both inner and outer bone
  • Create new, healthy, youthfully strong and flexible bones the only way possible – from the inside out!


Make TruBone Complete™ an integral part of your daily bone health program including calcium-rich foods, exercise and supplementation.

description:
New! - NH-D3 Spray is your choice for a daily health formula!

 

Research suggests that healthy levels of Vitamin D3 (in the form of cholecalciferol) may support the body at the cellular level to maintain heart, joint, bone and muscle health, promote a healthy mood, and support a normal, healthy immune response.

name: NH-D3 Cellular Health Support*
short_description: NH-D3 Cellular Health Support* is your choice for a daily health formula!
description:
NH-D3 Cellular Health Support* is your choice for a daily health formula!

  • Promotes joint, muscle, brain & immune health
  • Support healthy mood


NH-D3 is a "fully active" supplement with no inactive fillers, featuring:

  • Swiss-sourced Vitamin D3 and
  • scFOS® prebiotics

 

Research suggests that healthy levels of Vitamin D3 (in the form of cholecalciferol) may support the body at the cellular level to maintain heart, joint, bone and muscle health, promote a healthy mood, and support a normal, healthy immune response.

 

Suggested Use: Adults take up to 2 capsules daily following a meal.
